title: Mobile-Based Language-Linguistic Intelligence Utilization Program for Language Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric learning environment, with 3–5 weekly mobile platform logins and 15–20-minute learning modules.

learning_goals: Learners can improve reading, writing, and speaking scores by at least 30% through language-cognitive intelligence enhancement activities over four weeks.
Learners can independently perform and certify language reasoning activities at least three times weekly via a mobile platform.
Learners demonstrate the ability to interpret complex texts using linguistic thinking tools (mind maps, keyword linking, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
